i always wonder how can YIFY releases be that small?
i mean, can anyone explain the HUGE difference in size? and how does that affect quality? if it does
YIFY only has 2ch audio output, if you don't have home theater, you can just download YIFY's torrent
You'd notice YIFY torrents have horrid quality if you used a higher quality screen.

"You'd notice YIFY torrents have horrid quality if you used a higher quality screen. "

I don't know how you define horrid.  I have a very nice 46" 1080p LG TV and sitting about 10' away, Yify's 1080p torrents look just as good as BR to me.

Yes, I have a 58" Panasonic Plasma and YiFi's torrents look excellent to me as well. Only the sound on his files is a little low and of course in 2ch rather than 5.1, but with Dolby Digital encoding to 5.1 it still sounds quite good. I go to Bozx if I must have 5.1, because his files are also high quality but with native 5.1. I personally don't think the sound adds that much to the file size ..I think it is simply different compression methods used.

YIFY's torrents were great for me when I was watching on my 22 inch HD monitor.  When I went to a 32 inch HD TV screen, the compression artifacts were very evident.  So I am patient and wait for larger files like BOZX's to download now. 

I just never understand the pointless, endless arguing and bitching over compression.  There are so many different providers out there, just find what you want and shut up.
